summary: This file defines a Vue component named 'WorkedWith' that displays a scrolling carousel of company logos.
functionality: The component provides a scrolling animation for a set of company logos, which reverses direction when reaching the end of the container.
relationships: This component likely fits into a larger section of the project that showcases the companies the user has worked with.
It may be used in conjunction with other components that display user profiles or work experience.

identified_relationships.description: The WorkedWith component is likely referenced in the index.html file to be included in the main application.
The WorkedWith component may use Tailwind CSS classes defined in the tailwind.config.js file for styling the carousel.
The WorkedWith component is part of a Vite project, and its configuration might be influenced by settings in vite.config.js.
